name: YOUR NAME IN A FRAME
description:
This year you can give a personalised hand made gift one step above the rest.

These hand painted picture pebbles spell out persons name, with name and date of birth initials on the lower pebble. Framed in a box frame, width 25x height 25+ depth 4.5cm. Makes excellent Christening or Valentine's present . Looks great in anyone's home, perfect gift for loved one, VERY affordable piece of art by professional, competition winning artist! (See about section on this site). Work of art signed by artist on back of frame. 

Please email initials (or anything else you want on there) after you have processed your order to email address; thepebblefactory@gmail.com.

Larger size available for longer names, also avaialbe in black or white frame. Please see options below.  

Set your love in stone!

We can also create other individual, personalised bespoke picture messages on pebbles at your request, please email us at thepebblefactory @gmail.com if you have something specific in mind.

Despatched using signed for, next day delivery service from our despatch date for UK customers. Usually despatch 1-3 days from receipt of order. Also deliver world wide. For rush orders please email thepebblefactory@gmail.com

name: PERSONALISED PEBBLE MESSAGE
description:
Beautiful frame, 30x30cm wooden frame with hand painted pebbles with encrypted personal message held in the picture. The example image here says: "Rosie, you are my rock love joe x" click next image to see. Thick quality frame 3.3cm wide with natural canvas backing. 

Looks really great in anyone's home, perfect gift for loved one, thoughtful gift, makes a great valentines day, birthday or new home present. VERY affordable piece of art signed for on back of frame. My pebble art has won art competition in London's Royal College of Art, please see about section on this site for full story.  

Available in two frame sizes, 30x30cm (up to 25 pebble spaces), 60x60cm (Up to 50 pebble spaces). 

PLEASE REMEMBER TO EMAIL YOUR PERSONAL MESSAGE WHEN YOU HAVE CHECKED OUT FROM YOUR CART. thepebblefactory@gmail.com

Pebbles are original hand crafted "made-to-order" art works, your item will have the same specification and finish as the one in this picture. A perfect gift for the "hard-to-buy for" and VERY affordable. Set your love in stone! 

For specific themes, frame sizes or colours please email thepebblefactory@gmail.com

We allow a two or three pebble lenience to help you choose which frame size you will need for your message. 

Despatched using signed for, next day delivery service from our despatch date for UK customers. Usually despatch 1-3 days from receipt of order. Also deliver world wide. For rush orders please email thepebblefactory@gmail.com
